title: Riot your system is broken
body: I carry most games and win 10-15 lp every time why? and when i lose due to terrible teammates i lose 18-20 your lp system is broken or something? because i win 4 times lose twice all my lp gone thats how it works fix this make it like 20 a win 15-20 loss due to performance of something

replies.body:
Your MMR is entirely based on if you win or lose.
If you are where you belong on the ranking system you will gain 10-15 LP and lose roughly 20 LP.
If you you belong higher you'll gain more than you lose.

I say this again, it's 100% win or lose. How you perform means nothing to the ranking system. It is ONLY if you win or lose. If you win 60% + of your games your MMR will be higher than your Rank and you'll gain more LP than you lose.

That's how it works.
It doesn't matter if you go 100/0/100.
It doesn't matter if you go 0/100/0.
It only matters who's nexus dies first.

That's why someone who focuses objectives purely against kills and working with team mates will often climb the ranks faster than others.
Force the enemy inhibitor open at 10 minutes, and you will win every game, and that will make you climb.

That is not how is should work though, not at all anymore. With the change to the queue system they need to change how the LP and scorecards work and allow a personal scoring system. This season is so much more retarded than the 4 other seasons I have been in it is just a joke now how Riot are treating the game.

Well that's how it works when you have an MMR system.
It's based off the Chess ranking system which also only works on if you win or lose because that determines your skill in Chess.

You can't have a team based game's ranking rely on individual performance, or else people would go for their individual score and not winning the game. Know what happens when people play for score and not the objectives that are required to win?
They lose.

As for this season being a joke, that's stupid.
Dynamic queue has improved the quality of games in ranked, practically eliminated lobby rage/toxicity.
Yes it doesn't work that well in high elo, but that's being worked on.
The two major rebalancing we've had this season with ADCs and mages have been great for champion diversity for the most part.
The changes to the jungle put greater importance on Junglers for control of objectives and more control for junglers to influence the outcome of a game.
Only problem I've had is the changes to minions, makes last hitting horrible and minion block has killed me more times than I want to count.

I have put together a spreadsheet that shows what LP gain or lose you could get based on how you play, it probably needs fine tuning but works well.

I have seen players try to be heroes and get nothing but a good personal score, but fail on the metrics that are required for team work and actually lose LP in a win, hell, I played a game myself that I tried to get a good personal score without helping my team much, I got a negative score.

It IS possible, but players seem to think otherwise. Yeh you may get the occasional person get a really good personal score and be the only one on the team to gain something, but from every gasme I have checked, my results go well against this. Most games that have a good team, everyone gets a better score overall because teamwork does in fact get you a better personal score in most cases.
